Mon, 24 Mar 2025 23:54:47 +0000 The driver of this car said her tyres were so coated in debris it kept flying off for several kilometres (left). Right: Two days later the tyres were still coated in tar despite a lot of driving and a car wash. Inset: The bonnet has multiple paint chips from flying stones.
